nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Really? What did you think of it? Isn't it cool, neat and exciting?

options.text: Is the art you post really made by you?

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Thank you! I have spent a long time working on my art now. It's not about skill, it's about expression.

options.text: Actually, no. I think that your faking it.

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: Of course it is! I spent a lot of time creating the pieces I have posted on ShareSpace.

options.text: Okay... sory, it just looked a bit ai generated

nodes.speaker: Kaila
nodes.message: That's okay. Everyone makes msitakes, and I can understand the feat-- especially in today's AI driven world..
